 1	import { createFileRoute, redirect } from "@tanstack/react-router";
 2	
 3	import { useState } from "react";
 4	import { RoomExpiredError } from "~/components/RoomExpiredError";
 5	import { SessionInfoCard } from "~/components/SessionInfoCard";
 6	import { TextSyncArea } from "~/components/TextSyncArea";
 7	import { Button } from "~/components/ui/button";

 9	import { deleteRoom, getRoom, updateRoomTimestamp } from "~/serverFn/rooms";
 10	
 11	export const Route = createFileRoute("/text-sync/$id")({
 12		loader: async ({ params }) => {
 13			const roomId = params.id;
 14	
 15			// Validate room exists
 16			const room = await getRoom({ data: { id: roomId } });
 17	
 18			if (!room) {
 19				throw redirect({ to: "/" });
 20			}
 21	
 22			// Check if room is older than 24 hours
 23			const now = new Date();
 24			const roomCreatedAt = new Date(room.createdAt);
 25			const hoursDiff =
 26				(now.getTime() - roomCreatedAt.getTime()) / (1000 * 60 * 60);
 27	
 28			if (hoursDiff > 24) {
 29				// Room is expired, return special flag
 30				return {
 31					room,
 32					messages: [],
 33					isExpired: true,
 34				};
 35			}
 36	
 37			// Room is valid, update its timestamp
 38			await updateRoomTimestamp({ data: { id: roomId } });
 39	
 40			const messages = await getMessagesByRoom({ data: { roomId } });
 41			return {
 42				room,
 43				messages,
 44				isExpired: false,
 45			};
 46		},
 47	
 48		component: TextSyncPage,
 49	});

 1	import { createServerFn } from "@tanstack/react-start";
 2	import { eq } from "drizzle-orm";
 3	import * as v from "valibot";
 4	import { db } from "~/lib/db";
 5	import { messages } from "~/lib/db/schema/schema";
 6	import { MessageCreateSchema, MessageUpdateSchema } from "~/validation/schema";
 7	import type { MessagesInsert } from "~/validation/types";
 8	
 9	// List all messages
 10	export const listMessages = createServerFn({ method: "GET" }).handler(
 11		async () => {
 12			return db.select().from(messages);
 13		},
 14	);
 15	
 16	// Get messages by room id
 17	export const getMessagesByRoom = createServerFn({ method: "POST" })
 18		.validator(v.object({ roomId: v.string() }))
 19		.handler(async ({ data }) => {
 20			const { roomId } = data;
 21	
 22			const messagesList = await db
 23				.select()
 24				.from(messages)
 25				.where(eq(messages.roomId, roomId));
 26			return messagesList || [];
 27		});
 28	
 29	// Get one message by id
 30	export const getMessage = createServerFn({ method: "POST" })
 31		.validator(v.object({ id: v.string() }))
 32		.handler(async ({ data }) => {
 33			const { id } = data;
 34	
 35			const [message] = await db
 36				.select()
 37				.from(messages)
 38				.where(eq(messages.id, id));
 39			return message ?? null;
 40		});
 41	
 42	// Create a message
 43	export const createMessage = createServerFn({ method: "POST" })
 44		.validator(MessageCreateSchema)
 45		.handler(async ({ data }) => {
 46			const validatedData = data as { roomId: string; title?: string; content?: string };
 47			const [message] = await db
 48				.insert(messages)
 49				.values({
 50					roomId: validatedData.roomId,
 51					title: validatedData.title ?? null,
 52					content: validatedData.content ?? null,
 53				})
 54				.returning();
 55			return message;
 56		});
 57	
 58	// Update a message
 59	export const updateMessage = createServerFn({ method: "POST" })
 60		.validator(MessageUpdateSchema)
 61		.handler(async ({ data }) => {
 62			const { id, content, title } = data;
 63	
 64			const updateValues: Partial<MessagesInsert> = {};
 65			if (typeof content !== "undefined") updateValues.content = content;
 66			if (typeof title !== "undefined") updateValues.title = title;
 67	
 68			if (Object.keys(updateValues).length === 0) {
 69				throw new Error("No fields provided to update");
 70			}
 71	
 72			const [updated] = await db
 73				.update(messages)
 74				.set(updateValues)
 75				.where(eq(messages.id, id))
 76				.returning();
 77	
 78			return updated ?? null;
 79		});

 3	import { relations } from "drizzle-orm";
 4	import { pgTable, text, timestamp, uuid, varchar } from "drizzle-orm/pg-core";
 5	
 6	// --------------------- ROOMS ---------------------
 7	export const rooms = pgTable("rooms", {
 8		// Use a short 6-character room ID
 9		id: varchar("id", { length: 6 }).primaryKey(),
 10		name: varchar("name", { length: 255 }).notNull(),
 11		createdAt: timestamp("created_at").defaultNow().notNull(),
 12		updatedAt: timestamp("updated_at").defaultNow().notNull(),
 13	});
 14	
 15	// --------------------- MESSAGES ---------------------
 16	export const messages = pgTable("messages", {
 17		id: uuid("id").defaultRandom().primaryKey(),
 18		roomId: varchar("room_id", { length: 6 })
 19			.notNull()
 20			.references(() => rooms.id, { onDelete: "cascade" }),
 21		title: text("title"),
 22		content: text("content"),
 23		createdAt: timestamp("created_at").defaultNow().notNull(),
 24		updatedAt: timestamp("updated_at").defaultNow().notNull(),
 25	});
 26	
 27	// --------------------- RELATIONS ---------------------
 28	export const roomsRelations = relations(rooms, ({ many }) => ({
 29		messages: many(messages),
 30	}));
 31	
 32	export const messagesRelations = relations(messages, ({ one }) => ({
 33		room: one(rooms, {
 34			fields: [messages.roomId],
 35			references: [rooms.id],
 36		}),
 37	}));

 1	import { createServerFn } from "@tanstack/react-start";
 2	import { eq } from "drizzle-orm";
 3	import * as v from "valibot";
 4	import { db } from "~/lib/db";
 5	import { rooms } from "~/lib/db/schema/schema";
 6	import { RoomCreateSchema, RoomUpdateSchema } from "~/validation/schema";
 7	
 8	// List all rooms
 9	export const listRooms = createServerFn({ method: "GET" }).handler(async () => {
 10		return db.select().from(rooms);
 11	});
 12	
 13	// Get one room by id
 14	export const getRoom = createServerFn({ method: "POST" })
 15		.validator(v.object({ id: v.string() }))
 16		.handler(async ({ data }) => {
 17			const [row] = await db.select().from(rooms).where(eq(rooms.id, data.id));
 18			return row ?? null;
 19		});
 20	
 21	// Create a room
 22	export const createRoom = createServerFn({ method: "POST" })
 23		.validator(RoomCreateSchema)
 24		.handler(async ({ data }) => {
 25			const alphabet = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ0123456789";
 26			const makeId = () =>
 27				Array.from(
 28					{ length: 6 },
 29					() => alphabet[Math.floor(Math.random() * alphabet.length)],
 30				).join("");
 31			let id = makeId();
 32			let attempts = 0;
 33			while (attempts < 5) {
 34				const [existing] = await db.select().from(rooms).where(eq(rooms.id, id));
 35				if (!existing) break;
 36				id = makeId();
 37				attempts += 1;
 38			}
 39			const [created] = await db
 40				.insert(rooms)
 41				.values({ id, name: data.name })
 42				.returning();
 43			return created;
 44		});

 10	export const MessageUpdateSchema = v.object({

 16	// Room schemas
 17	export const RoomCreateSchema = v.object({
 18		name: v.pipe(
 19			v.string(),
 20			v.nonEmpty("Room name is required"),
 21			v.maxLength(255, "Room name must be less than 255 characters"),
 22			v.trim(),
 23		),
 24	});
 25	
 26	export const RoomUpdateSchema = v.object({
 27		id: v.pipe(v.string(), v.nonEmpty("Room ID is required")),
 28		name: v.optional(
 29			v.pipe(
 30				v.string(),
 31				v.nonEmpty("Room name cannot be empty"),
 32				v.maxLength(255, "Room name must be less than 255 characters"),
 33				v.trim(),
 34			),
 35		),
 36	});
 37	
 38	// Join room schema
 39	export const JoinRoomSchema = v.object({
 40		code: v.pipe(
 41			v.string(),
 42			v.nonEmpty("Room code is required"),
 43			v.length(6, "Room code must be exactly 6 characters"),
 44			v.regex(/^[A-Z0-9]+$/, "Room code must contain only uppercase letters and numbers"),
 45		),

 1	import { Check, Copy, FileText } from "lucide-react";
 2	import { useEffect, useRef, useState } from "react";
 3	import { Button } from "~/components/ui/button";
 4	
 5	interface TextSyncAreaProps {
 6		text: string;
 7		onTextChange: (text: string) => void;
 8	}
 9	
 10	export function TextSyncArea({ text, onTextChange }: TextSyncAreaProps) {
 11		const textareaRef = useRef<HTMLTextAreaElement>(null);
 12		const [copied, setCopied] = useState(false);
 13	
 14		const handleCopyText = async () => {
 15			if (text) {
 16				try {
 17					await navigator.clipboard.writeText(text);
 18					setCopied(true);
 19					setTimeout(() => setCopied(false), 2000);
 20				} catch (err) {
 21					console.error("Failed to copy text:", err);
 22				}
 23			}
 24		};
 25		// Auto-resize textarea
 26		useEffect(() => {
 27			if (textareaRef.current) {
 28				textareaRef.current.style.height = "auto";
 29				textareaRef.current.style.height = `${textareaRef.current.scrollHeight}px`;
 30			}
 31		}, []);
 32	
 33		return (
 34			<div className="bg-white/80 dark:bg-gray-800/80 backdrop-blur-xl rounded-2xl shadow-xl border border-white/20 dark:border-gray-700/20 overflow-hidden">
 35				{/* Header */}
 36				<div className="p-6 border-b border-gray-200 dark:border-gray-700">
 37					<div className="flex items-center justify-between">
 38						<div>
 39							<h3 className="text-lg font-semibold text-gray-900 dark:text-white flex items-center gap-2">
 40								<FileText className="w-5 h-5 text-blue-600 dark:text-blue-400" />
 41								Synchronized Text
 42							</h3>
 43							<p className="text-gray-600 dark:text-gray-300 text-sm mt-1">
 44								Type or paste text here - it will sync across all connected
 45								devices
 46							</p>
 47						</div>
 48					</div>
 49				</div>
 50	
 51				{/* Text Area */}
 52				<div className="p-6">
 53					<div className="relative">
 54						<textarea
 55							ref={textareaRef}
 56							value={text}
 57							onChange={(e) => onTextChange(e.target.value)}
 58							placeholder="Start typing or paste your text here..."
 59							className="w-full min-h-[300px] p-4 border border-gray-200 dark:border-gray-600 rounded-xl bg-white dark:bg-gray-700 text-gray-900 dark:text-white placeholder-gray-500 dark:placeholder-gray-400 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-transparent resize-none transition-all duration-200 font-mono text-sm leading-relaxed"
 60							style={{ height: "auto" }}
 61						/>
 62					</div>
 63	
 64					{/* Footer */}
 65					<div className="flex items-center justify-between mt-4">
 66						<div className="flex items-center gap-4 text-sm text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-400">
 67							<div className="flex items-center gap-2">
 68								<span>{text.length} characters</span>
 69							</div>
 70							<div className="flex items-center gap-2">
 71								<span>{text.split("\n").length} lines</span>
 72							</div>
 73							{text && (
 74								<div className="flex items-center gap-2">
 75									<span>
 76										{text.split(/\s+/).filter((word) => word.length > 0).length}{" "}
 77										words
 78									</span>
 79								</div>
 80							)}
 81						</div>
 82	
 83						<div className="flex items-center gap-2">
 84							{/* Clear button */}
 85							{text && (
 86								<Button
 87									variant="outline"
 88									size="sm"
 89									onClick={() => onTextChange("")}
 90									className="text-gray-600 dark:text-gray-400 hover:text-red-600 dark:hover:text-red-400"

 92									Clear

Path: README.md
 1	# [React TanStarter](https://github.com/dotnize/react-tanstarter)
 2	
 3	A minimal starter template for TanStack Start. [ Preview here](https://tanstarter.nize.ph/)
 4	
 5	- [React 19](https://react.dev) + [React Compiler](https://react.dev/learn/react-compiler)
 6	- TanStack [Start](https://tanstack.com/start/latest) + [Router](https://tanstack.com/router/latest) + [Query](https://tanstack.com/query/latest)
 7	- [Tailwind CSS v4](https://tailwindcss.com/) + [shadcn/ui](https://ui.shadcn.com/)
 8	- [Drizzle ORM](https://orm.drizzle.team/) + PostgreSQL
 9	- [Better Auth](https://www.better-auth.com/)
 10	
 11	## Getting Started
 12	
 13	We're using **pnpm** by default, but you can modify the scripts in [package.json](./package.json) to use your preferred package manager.
 14	
 15	1. [Use this template](https://github.com/new?template_name=react-tanstarter&template_owner=dotnize) or clone this repository with gitpick:
 16	
 17	 ```bash
 18	 npx gitpick dotnize/react-tanstarter myapp
 19	 cd myapp
 20	 ```
 21	
 22	2. Install dependencies:
 23	
 24	 ```bash
 25	 pnpm install
 26	 ```
 27	
 28	3. Create a `.env` file based on [`.env.example`](.env).
 29	
 30	4. Push the schema to your database with drizzle-kit:
 31	
 32	 ```bash
 33	 pnpm db push
 34	 ```
 35	
 36	 https://orm.drizzle.team/docs/migrations
 37	
 38	5. Run the development server:
 39	
 40	 ```bash
 41	 pnpm dev
 42	 ```
 43	
 44	 The development server should now be running at [http://localhost:3000](http://localhost:3000).
...

 9	export function createRouter() {
 10	 const queryClient = new QueryClient({
 11	 defaultOptions: {
 12	 queries: {
 13	 refetchOnWindowFocus: false,
 14	 staleTime: 1000 * 60 * 2, // 2 minutes
 15	 },
 16	 },
 17	 });
 18	
 19	 return routerWithQueryClient(
 20	 createTanStackRouter({
 21	 routeTree,
 22	 context: { queryClient, user: null },
 23	 defaultPreload: "intent",
 24	 // react-query will handle data fetching & caching
 25	 // https://tanstack.com/router/latest/docs/framework/react/guide/data-loading#passing-all-loader-events-to-an-external-cache
 26	 defaultPreloadStaleTime: 0,
 27	 defaultErrorComponent: DefaultCatchBoundary,
 28	 defaultNotFoundComponent: NotFound,
 29	 scrollRestoration: true,
 30	 defaultStructuralSharing: true,
 31	 }),
 32	 queryClient,
 33	 );
 34	}

 1	import { Check, Copy, FileText } from "lucide-react";
 2	import { useEffect, useRef, useState } from "react";
 3	import { Button } from "~/components/ui/button";
 4	
 5	interface TextSyncAreaProps {
 6		text: string;
 7		onTextChange: (text: string) => void;
 8	}
 9	
 10	export function TextSyncArea({ text, onTextChange }: TextSyncAreaProps) {
 11		const textareaRef = useRef<HTMLTextAreaElement>(null);
 12		const [copied, setCopied] = useState(false);
 13	
 14		const handleCopyText = async () => {
 15			if (text) {
 16				try {
 17					await navigator.clipboard.writeText(text);
 18					setCopied(true);
 19					setTimeout(() => setCopied(false), 2000);
 20				} catch (err) {
 21					console.error("Failed to copy text:", err);
 22				}
 23			}
 24		};
 25		// Auto-resize textarea
 26		useEffect(() => {
 27			if (textareaRef.current) {
 28				textareaRef.current.style.height = "auto";
 29				textareaRef.current.style.height = `${textareaRef.current.scrollHeight}px`;
 30			}
 31		}, []);
 32	
 33		return (
 34			<div className="bg-white/80 dark:bg-gray-800/80 backdrop-blur-xl rounded-2xl shadow-xl border border-white/20 dark:border-gray-700/20 overflow-hidden">
 35				{/* Header */}
 36				<div className="p-6 border-b border-gray-200 dark:border-gray-700">
 37					<div className="flex items-center justify-between">
 38						<div>
 39							<h3 className="text-lg font-semibold text-gray-900 dark:text-white flex items-center gap-2">
 40								<FileText className="w-5 h-5 text-blue-600 dark:text-blue-400" />
 41								Synchronized Text
 42							</h3>
 43							<p className="text-gray-600 dark:text-gray-300 text-sm mt-1">
 44								Type or paste text here - it will sync across all connected
 45								devices
 46							</p>
 47						</div>
 48					</div>
 49				</div>
 50	
 51				{/* Text Area */}
 52				<div className="p-6">
 53					<div className="relative">
 54						<textarea
 55							ref={textareaRef}
 56							value={text}
 57							onChange={(e) => onTextChange(e.target.value)}
 58							placeholder="Start typing or paste your text here..."
 59							className="w-full min-h-[300px] p-4 border border-gray-200 dark:border-gray-600 rounded-xl bg-white dark:bg-gray-700 text-gray-900 dark:text-white placeholder-gray-500 dark:placeholder-gray-400 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-transparent resize-none transition-all duration-200 font-mono text-sm leading-relaxed"
 60							style={{ height: "auto" }}

Path: src/routes/text-sync/$id.tsx
 1	import { createFileRoute, redirect } from "@tanstack/react-router";
 2	
 3	import { useState } from "react";
 4	import { RoomExpiredError } from "~/components/RoomExpiredError";
 5	import { SessionInfoCard } from "~/components/SessionInfoCard";
 6	import { TextSyncArea } from "~/components/TextSyncArea";
 7	import { Button } from "~/components/ui/button";
 8	import { getMessagesByRoom } from "~/serverFn/messages";
 9	import { deleteRoom, getRoom, updateRoomTimestamp } from "~/serverFn/rooms";
 10	
 11	export const Route = createFileRoute("/text-sync/$id")({
 12		loader: async ({ params }) => {
 13			const roomId = params.id;
 14	
 15			// Validate room exists
 16			const room = await getRoom({ data: { id: roomId } });
 17	
 18			if (!room) {
 19				throw redirect({ to: "/" });
 20			}
 21	
 22			// Check if room is older than 24 hours
 23			const now = new Date();
 24			const roomCreatedAt = new Date(room.createdAt);
 25			const hoursDiff =
 26				(now.getTime() - roomCreatedAt.getTime()) / (1000 * 60 * 60);
 27	
 28			if (hoursDiff > 24) {
 29				// Room is expired, return special flag
 30				return {
 31					room,
 32					messages: [],
 33					isExpired: true,
 34				};
 35			}
 36	
 37			// Room is valid, update its timestamp
 38			await updateRoomTimestamp({ data: { id: roomId } });
 39	
 40			const messages = await getMessagesByRoom({ data: { roomId } });
 41			return {
 42				room,
 43				messages,
 44				isExpired: false,
 45			};
 46		},
 47	
 48		component: TextSyncPage,
 49	});
 50	
 51	function TextSyncPage() {
 52		const { room, messages, isExpired } = Route.useLoaderData();
 53		const [isDeleting, setIsDeleting] = useState(false);
 54		const initialContent = messages?.[0]?.content ?? "";
 55		const [text, setText] = useState(initialContent);
 56	
 57		// If room is expired, show error page
 58		if (isExpired) {
 59			return <RoomExpiredError roomId={room.id} />;
 60		}
 61	
 62		const handleTextChange = (newText: string) => {
 63			setText(newText);
 64		};
...

 88			<div className="min-h-screen bg-gradient-to-br from-blue-50 via-indigo-50 to-purple-50 dark:from-gray-900 dark:via-blue-900 dark:to-indigo-900">
 89				{/* Header */}
 90				{/*	<header className="p-4 border-b border-white/20 dark:border-gray-700/20 backdrop-blur-sm bg-white/80 dark:bg-gray-800/80">
 91					<Header isConnected={isConnected} />
 92				</header>
 93	*/}
 94				<div className=" max-w-4xl mx-auto p-6 space-y-6">

 96
